metadata.Title: CVE-2022-36561 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: XPDF v4.0.4 was discovered to contain a segmentation violation via the component /xpdf/AcroForm.cc:538.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> debian xpdf is slightly different from upstream xpdf, and does not include AcroForm.cc file. texlive-bin includes xpdf files. emscripten includes xpdf in the tests and could be ignored.

criterions.comment: emscripten package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
ipe package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
texlive-bin package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
